title: Possibly the most overhyped film of the century!!!
review: Incredibly disappointing , so much excitement had been generated around this film , the americans were lauding it for oscars and naming it the scariest film ever . Nonsense ! What basically is a very poor sister to Cannibal Holocaust sums up this film . Deodato's classic defined this genre 15 years ago this does not come close

title: The funniest film of the year!!!
review: Being somewhat cautious about watching this film due to the overhyping of the extremely poor blairwitch project , i did feel the americans were going to do it again . Laud about something that really doesn't deserve it . I was wrong , this film was easily the funniest film i had seen this year and lived up to all the hype i had heard . Although the humour was smut riddled and the toilet based humour was putting There's something about mary to shame , the whole film worked and certainly gave us a Porky's or Screwballs for the millenium . The actors carried their parts of with ease and gave the viewer a squirm factor not felt for a long time . Nothing more to say except for we want m
